attributes.action: Reduce the number of school holidays to fit in with modern life.
attributes.additional_details: Lengthy school holidays are an antiquated relic of the Victorian era – a necessity for the agricultural economy of the nineteenth century when schools needed long summer holidays so children could toil in the fields
attributes.background:
Reduce the annual School holidays

Shortening the school summer leave to fit in with modern life and families.

rejection.details: The UK Government doesn't set school holiday dates. These are the responsibility of individual schools and local councils.
